column6: THE REAL DEATH RACE BEGINS! ROBBIE REYES: FUGITIVE!!! Can the ALL-NEW GHOST RIDER outrace his doomed destiny? And what kind of VENGEANCE will JOHNNY BLAZE, DANNY KETCH, ALEJANDRA BLAZE, SLADE and ZERO COCHRANE unleash on him?
column8: | penciller (cover):Francesco Francavilla | editor:Mark Paniccia | writer:Felipe Smith | penciller:Juan Villanueva
